name: Brick Out The Wall
description:
You play as one of many bricks in wall but one day everything goes bizarre.

You come to life, There is a cat coming from the ceiling ?, WHY ARE THERE LASERS ???!!!, WHY IS THERE AN EYEBALL !!!!!!!??????

WHAT IS HAPPENING ??!!!

Controls:

Arrow keys to move.

Z to crouch/dodge blue attacks.

X to get rid of the furry cat.
